page.title: 02GEDDINGTON PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: At the moment of writing, Geddington CofE Primary School is on a split site. The Juniors in the Victorian building next to the Church and the Infants in mobile classrooms on the recreation field next to the Village Hall. A new Primary School for 150 children is being constructed in Wood Street using the old infant building as the school hall. There are 5 full time teachers, of whom one is the Head, and a part-time teacher who lives in the village. 114 children attend the school. All live in the village, except for 8 children from Warkton, Grafton Underwood and Boughton House.
